name: B. Jamie and Binary Sequence  changed after round
statement:
Jamie is preparing a Codeforces round. He has got an idea for a problem,
but does not know how to solve it. Help him write a solution to the
following problem:Find integers such that the sum of two to the power of
each number equals to the number and the largest integer in the answer
is as small as possible. As there may be multiple answers, you are asked
to output the lexicographically largest one. To be more clear, consider
all integer sequence with length with . Give a value to each sequence.
Among all sequence(s) that have the minimum value, output the one that
is the lexicographically largest.For definitions of powers and
lexicographical order see notes.
